title: Rajputana Pink Sapphire & Polki Diamond Bangle - 'Sobha' Collection
materials: Handcrafted Kundan Setting. Features vibrant Pink Sapphires with excellent clarity. Encrusted with Polki Diamonds in a traditional Hyderabadi setting.
features: This exquisite bangle features a traditional Kundan setting, meticulously handcrafted by artisans of Hyderabad. The alternating arrangement of square-cut Pink Sapphires and Polki diamonds creates a striking visual balance. The antique gold finish adds a touch of vintage charm and timeless elegance, reminiscent of Mughal artistry.
colors: Dominant gold with vibrant pink sapphires and the natural
milky white of Polki diamonds. The color palette exudes regality and sophistication.
occasions: and other special occasions like Sangeet
and traditional Telugu ceremonies such as Seemantham and Pelli Choopulu. Also suitable for adding a touch of royal elegance to any modern ensemble.
description: This bangle is a true statement piece, showcasing the pinnacle of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of vibrant Pink Sapphires and Polki diamonds creates a captivating sparkle, while the traditional Kundan setting pays homage to India's rich heritage. It is a unique and timeless investment that will be cherished for generations, a 'Samskruti' (cultural heritage) piece.
